Screen¶

class game.screen.Page(buttons: List, active: bool = False)¶

Page class. Contains objects with methods show() and hide().

Parameters

  • buttons (List) – Objects of this page.

  • active (bool) – If page should be active from the start.

hide_all() → None¶

Disable all objects on the page. :rtype: None

show_all() → None¶

Show all objects on the page. :rtype: None
